Is it going to be another beach?

Yup, Dariya and Nadari were added as characters after I drew Leisure, so I feel they were sorta left out

Inb4 steam comes out of Ted's ears~<3

Edited June 2, 2013 by chobit-389

Love the wallpapers, I think I'm going to change my background later today.

Come on guys, at least make an attempt to stay on topic..

I am sorry, sir... I am not able to complete this quest, I'm afraid... How many EXP point would I get for this if I'd complete it anyway?

Yup, Dariya and Nadari were added as characters after I drew Leisure, so I feel they were sorta left out

-beautiful image-

Love it. can't wait to see more! Edited June 2, 2013 by MmPMSFmM
As always, I forget to read the very last page and then I reply :D
I'm a failing failhead.

I'm a failing failhead.

...and your point is?

And about the image...

Well, then...
Its a very...ummm...interesting image.

...and your point is?

My point is: I forget to read the newest page, and reply. And instead of editing my old reply, I post a new one, and then I have 2 posts!
Any updates? Chobit has been suspiciously...nonexistent.
No, I'm just been asleep >.>
petty excuse sleep is no reason to stop working *cracks the wip* MOAR

petty excuse sleep is no reason to stop working *cracks the wip* MOAR

Passion of the Christ 3. Now with more whipping!

Coming to theaters near you.

Passion of the Christ 3. Now with more whipping!

Coming to theaters near you.

passion of chobit 389

passion of chobit 389

No, Passion of the Chobit would be less about whipping and more about running for our lives.

Anyway, Indiana Jones and whipping aside, how goes progress?

Chobit has other ways to torture or kill us. Such as shovels.

On-topic: Any new news?
I'm guessing not.
Not really, no. Chobit's working on non-Kerbal arts. I'm dealing with emotion-induced writer's block.
I would think that excess emotion would enhance one's writing ability. or at least enhance their writing ability for being able to describe said emotion in text.

I would think that excess emotion would enhance one's writing ability. or at least enhance their writing ability for being able to describe said emotion in text.

Not when all one wants to write is essentially "Suddenly explosion! everyone died, the end."

On topic: In another dimension, which one of the three would most likely be the main contestant representing Valhalla in a hypothetical Kerbovision Song Contest?

Yes, I know I'm scraping the bottom of the barrel with these questions, but it's hard to stay on-topic without constantly asking for progress reports otherwise.

On topic: In another dimension, which one of the three would most likely be the main contestant representing Valhalla in a hypothetical Kerbovision Song Contest?

Yes, I know I'm scraping the bottom of the barrel with these questions, but it's hard to stay on-topic without constantly asking for progress reports otherwise.

Dariya, probably. She's the partier. Nadari'd be totally lost trying to have fun at something that wasn't engineering-related. Same with Freya, except flight-related.

Going on a brief hiatus to work on an art trade with Kloudmutt (careful if you look him up, you'll be buried in NSFW and/or pony).

In fact I doubt I could show you the results of either of us since it's bound to be drenched in Rule #34.

TL;DR and Inb4 the modz: BRB, and art-trade is to be followed by rocket pic
Oh god Kloudmutt.
Any idea on how long the hiatus would be?

Any idea on how long the hiatus would be?

Yeah, I'd like to know that as well.

Let's hope the hiatus is short, so we may get more PfL soon.

Also, you need to clean your inbox again Chobit, it's not letting me reply.
Fixed! And it'll probably be short, just need to paint one pic and touch up another
